body.p: In developing SFAS 141, the FASB also considered the relevance of information about goodwill. Although the IASB’s Basis for Conclusions on IFRS 3 did not explicitly discuss the relevance of information about goodwill, the FASB’s analysis of that issue was available to the IASB members as they developed IFRS 3, and they saw no reason not to accept that analysis.
